name: thoughtpad-plugin-zotero
description: Thoughtpad plugin that adds embedded metadata to pages to be used by Zotero

scripts.test: node --harmony ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- -R spec && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && rm -rf ./coverage
